privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At SEIKYU, we take your privacy seriously. This document explains what data we collect and how we use it.

collection.title: Data Collection
collection.content: We collect only the necessary information to provide our services, including your email and account details for authentication via Supabase.

usage.title: Data Usage
usage.content: Your data is used solely to manage your invoices, clients, and payments within the application. We do not sell your data to third parties.

security.title: Security
security.content: We use enterprise-grade security provided by Supabase and industry-standard encryption to protect your financial information.

one.text: SEIKYU has completely transformed how I handle my freelance business. I can now generate invoices in seconds and see my monthly revenue grow without getting lost in spreadsheets.

docs.title: SEIKYU Project
docs.subtitle: A modern, efficient financial management system built with Vue 3, PrimeVue, and Supabase. Designed for speed, scalability, and clean code.
docs.pattern_description: SEIKYU uses a Composable + Generic Component pattern to minimize code duplication.
docs.steps_example: // Example of creating a new Entity page in 3 steps
docs.rls_tip: Always check Supabase RLS policies when adding new tables to ensure the Auth Store can access the data securely.

auth.title: Authentication
auth.desc: Secure login and logout using Supabase Auth. Session persistence with LocalStorage and real-time state sync with Pinia.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.desc: Centralized overview of business metrics including Total Receivable, Monthly Collections, and Client Engagement.

crm.title: Client CRM
crm.desc: Full CRUD management for clients. Track contact details, status, and associated financial history.

invoicing.title: Invoicing System
invoicing.desc: Generate and manage invoices. Track statuses from Draft to Paid or Overdue. Real-time balance calculations.

payments.title: Payment Tracking
payments.desc: Record payments against invoices. Support for partial payments and full transaction history.

architecture.generic: A high-level reusable component that handles tables, dialogs, and forms for any entity. Reduces boilerplate by 70%.
architecture.composable: Dynamic composable that provides standard CRUD actions (fetch, create, update, delete) for any Supabase table.
architecture.pinia: Single source of truth for user data and session status. Automatically reacts to Supabase auth events.
